title: 祭りはひとりじゃできやしねえ

text.jpText:
イナリワンの大井への想いが台無しに
ならぬよう、トレーナーは親方に会い、
地方で走る真意と目指しているものを伝えた。
text.enText:
In order to prevent Inari One's love for 
Oi from being spoiled, the trainer met 
with her master and told her The trainer 
met with the master and told her of Inari 
One's true intentions and goals for running 
in the local area.

text.jpText:
すると親方はトレセン学園を訪問。
イナリワンが地方の“テッペン”を目指すと
自分たちに宣言しないことに苦言を呈する。
text.enText:
Then the master visited the training school. 
She complains that Inari One does not declare 
to them that she is aiming for the "top" 
position in the region. She complains that 
Inari One does not declare to them that they 
are aiming for the "top" of the region.

text.jpText:
そして“テッペン”を獲る喧嘩をすることに
ビビらず、胸を張るよう発破をかけた。
text.enText:
She also encouraged them not to be 
afraid to fight for the "top" and 
to put their hearts on the line.

text.jpText:
イナリワンは地方の“テッペン”を獲ると
宣言。親方とのすれ違いは解消され、
真正面から大井の皆と喧嘩することになった。
text.enText:
Inari One declares that she will win the top 
position in the region. The differences 
between Inari One and her master were 
resolved. She is now ready to fight head-on 
with everyone in Oi.
